availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Daniel Mounts and Temperance Mounts. Student in Brooke County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Virginia, Brooke County, District 4, p. 279B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 479.
"John Milton Mounts (1841-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial #92781075, accessed March 31, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92781075.
